div.p: TO A NICE PERIOD OF REST
LET'S GO DOWN TO SICK BAY.
DOCTOR, I KNOW WHAT I KNOW.
THERE SEEMS TO BE IN YOURS.
IT IS NOT A GALACTIC NEBULA
WHAT DO YOU WANT ME TO SAY?
BUT WE SEEM TO HAVE ENTERED
BUT IT'S NOT THE FIRST TIME.
BUT WE HAVE A GOOD SHIP
AND I HAVE NO IDEA WHY.
AS FAR AS THE POWER LEVELS
BUT IT IS NOT THE SOURCE
I KNEW THE SHIP WAS LOST
AYE, THAT OUGHT TO DO IT.
IN THE HOPE THAT IT WILL
YANK US OUT OF THE ZONE.
I CANNOT SAY WHAT IT IS,
THAT IS WHAT IS DRAWING US
THE SAME WAY IT DREW THE
TO TAKE BLIND SHOTS AT IT,
THAT I INTEND TO PASS UP
FIND A WAY TO DESTROY IT,
TO LET ME SHARE IN THIS,
THE SIDE TO LET US KNOW.
TO TELL US WHAT TO DO
HOW LONG DO YOU THINK YOU
